page.title: 10TOURISM IN NETHERBURY
page.content: Spring here sees not only the return of the daffodils, but also the re-appearance of "B & B" signs on cottage walls and at farm gates. Overnight accommodation is available in a hotel, several pubs, guest houses and private homes. Good home cooked food is available in restaurants and pubs. There are several public footpaths for pleasant walks with good views and antique shops for tourists to browse in. Our most important tourist attraction is Parnham House with its furniture workshop and woodworking school, art and craft exhibitions, outdoor theatrical productions, lectures and musical evenings.
